ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup butter, cut into pieces
2 pounds raw shrimp, headless and shells on

gear.name: large skillet or cast iron pan

cookingTips: Use a hot skillet and high heat to quickly sear shrimp and lock in juices
Don't overcrowd the pan; cook in batches if needed to avoid steaming the shrimp
Toast bread with softened butter on the side for dipping in the buttery garlic sauce
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through achieving perfectly cooked shrimp with a garlicky butter sauce and preparing toasted bread for an impressive appetizer or light meal.
